import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import AdminLink from '../management/AdminLinks'; import { Card, CardContent, Grid} from '@material-ui/core'; import "./View.css" import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import services from '../../services/services'; function View() { const {id}=useParams(); const [quiz,setQuiz]=useState([]) const [que,setQue]=useState([]) const [resultdata,setResultdata]=useState([]) const data = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('friend')); const jwt = data['jwt']; useEffect(() => { getQuizBySlug(); }, []) const getQuizBySlug = async () => { const data={ quizSlug:id } const options = { method: 'Post', headers: { "Apiuserid": "49507884", "Scope": "In.QuizApp.READ", "Authorization": `quizApp-oauthtoken ${jwt}`, } } const result = await services.getQuizBySlug(data,options) console.log(result.data.data) setQuiz(result.data.data) setQue(JSON.parse(result.data.data[0].questionData)) setResultdata(JSON.parse(result.data.data[0].resultData)) }; console.log(que) return ( <> { quiz?.map((list,index)=>{ return(

Title

{list.title}

Slug

{list.slug}

language

{list.language}

upload

{ list.bannerImage? {list.bannerImage} : Image Not Uploaded } { que?.map((que,index)=>{ return(

Question

{que.questionTitle} {que.optionsArray?.map((options, index) => { return ( <> {options.optionImg?.length ?

{options.optionLabel}

:

{options.optionLabel}

} ) }) } ) }) } {/*

Question

{list.questionTitle}
Answer
 */} { resultdata?.map((res,index)=>{ return(

Result

{res.maxScore} {res.minScore} {res.title} {res.phrase} {res.needle} { res.resultImage===""?Image Not Uploaded: {res.resultImage} } ) }) } ) }) } ) } export default View
